message: The group I am in has recently attracted someone who is severely disrupting peace, harmony, and healthy conversation in it. She has just taken to swearing, and although I respect a persons right of free speech, I also feel it's inappropriate in this particular group. I would like to see a feature made available that allows group owners to ban members.
Sorry to hear about this. We really need to improve our group administrator capabilities. In the meantime, maybe you could send a private message to this person and politely ask for less swearing?
